item.title: Building Vu Meter
item.description: I like vintage audio equipment and my favorite thing are cassette decks with vu meters. When I was planing to build my audio amplifier I always knew that front panel must contain vu meters. On Aliexpress and Ebay many vu meters can be found but most of them are just voltage meters, to get real vu meters we need to salvage them from old decks. Luckily decks can be found dirt cheap.
